title: Gamend
description: Open source game server with authentication, users, lobbies, groups, friends, notifications, leaderboards, server scripting and admin portal

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Email, Magic-link, OAuth, JWT and Session.

features.title: Users
features.description: Register, login, reset password and verify email.

features.title: Groups
features.description: Communities with public, private, and hidden visibility.

features.title: Friends
features.description: Request, block, and lists with real-time presence and notifications.

features.title: Notifications
features.description: Send between friends and group members.

features.title: Server Scheduling
features.description: Schedule tasks for automated server operations.

features.title: Admin & Monitoring
features.description: Admin portal for managing data and configuration.
